posts.title: Pikachu Slippers
posts.content: Wake up to your own personal Pokemon by slipping on a pair of these fuzzy unisex Pikachu slippers every morning. Perfect for Pokemon fans of all ages, the only thing that surpasses their comfort is their level of cuteness.

posts.title: Super Mario Koopa Shell Backpack
posts.content: Ever wondered what happened to all those Koopa Turtles that Super Mario annihilated? Well, they were turned into backpacks! The Koopa Turtle Shell Backpack is a cool kid’s backpack that isn’t very practical, but makes up for it by being so damn awesome.

posts.title: Sound Responsive Party Ball
posts.content: Transform your desk or workstation into the ideal location for a little fiesta using this sound responsive party ball. This mini USB powered sphere creates a mesmerizing light show that moves to the beat of the music for an incredible and immersive experience.

posts.title: Disposable Drinking Flask
posts.content: Quit lugging around bulky flasks – now you can be an alcoholic on the go without feeling encumbered thanks to these lightweight disposable drinking flasks. These innovative pouches are collapsible and re-usable, so you can get inebriated every single day!

posts.title: Brain Gelatin Mold
posts.content: Appease your inner zombie with a daily helping of braaaiiinssss by digging into a fruity jello brain. Made from durable plastic, this brain mold easily helps you create colorful and delicious fruit flavored versions of the undead’s favorite food.

posts.title: Minion Plush Slippers
posts.content: Keep your feet warm and cozy while you bring your favorite pill like characters to life using these Minion plush slippers. Each slipper is designed to look like an adorable little Minion that’s eager to keep your footsies nice and toasty.

posts.title: Dual Stage Snow Thrower
posts.content: Clear your sidewalk and driveway in record time this winter by placing this dual stage snow thrower on the job. Built with a 306cc engine that provides 14.5 foot-pounds of torque, this powerful device has a 19.5″ intake height and can easily clear a 29″ wide path.

posts.title: Expandable Garage Shelves
posts.content: Keep the chaos at bay by organizing all the stuff in your garage using these expandable shelves. The shelves are composed of expandable steel tubes, feature high strength anchors and screws for durability, and install in minutes.

posts.title: How’s My Driving Car Sticker
posts.content: Show your fellow drivers how much you value their input with the “How’s My Driving” car sticker. This amusing decal provides your fellow motorists with a helpful phone number they can contact should they have an issue with the way you drive.

posts.title: Blanket Hogging Prevention Clamps
posts.content: Keep your partner from stealing your precious blanket in the middle of the night by outfitting your bed with these blanket hogging prevention clamps. They work on all bed configurations, won’t damage your sheets, and can hold up to 50 pounds of force.

posts.title: Light Up Glasses
posts.content: Create a chic environment at your next get together by serving up drinks in these light up glasses. Each of these highball glasses hold up to 16 ounces and emits a bright and colorful light from the bottom that lights up the entire glass giving it an incredible effect.

posts.title: Coloring Book For College Kids
posts.content: Relive your best and worst memories as you pass the time doodling in the Coloring Book For College Kids. Illustrated with artwork that resemble a children’s activity book, it offers a humorous look at the trials and tribulations of modern college experiences.
